encounter: A mysterious salty scent of a mermaid's hair envelops you, drawing you towards a concealed treasure vault within an ancient shipwreck where kelpie are rescuing shipwreck survivors.
Strange an abandoned lifeboat adrift on the waves lie scattered, painting a tale of cursed mermaids that training sea creatures for battle.
You stumble upon a shattered and toppled stone archway indicating past battles.
Trails of a moss-covered and ancient altar wind through the clusters of pine cones on the ground, revealing the past actions of a pride of ferocious mountain lions.
You stumble upon a toppled and shattered stone monolith indicating past battles.
Among the dense thick patches of clover, you discover a bundle of rare and enchanted trinkets. You can't shake the feeling of gratitude.

You uncover a sunken rowboat with a hole in its hull that tell a story of a time when sirens pursued rescue a kidnapped noble from a group of pirates..

The ground is littered with a toppled and vine-covered statue. It appears a family of hill dwarves skilled in blacksmithing were here recently.

You see a primitive map marked with enigmatic symbols that could be useful in your quest to rescue a group of trapped miners in an abandoned quarry.. But it's guarded by a tribe of friendly and herbivorous lizardfolk.
